sentences.sContent: Answer: Anyone can use a happy feeling to wish a refulgent result.
sentences.sContent_eng: Answer: Anyone can use a happy feeling to wish a refulgent result.
sentences.sCn: 答：任何人都可以用幸福的心情期待辉煌的成果。

sentences.sContent: "Lange" wants to create more refulgent tomorrow in the field of decoration.
sentences.sContent_eng: "Lange" wants to create more refulgent tomorrow in the field of decoration.
sentences.sCn: “兰格”在装饰领域要创造更加辉煌的明天。

sentences.sContent: The development and progress of sentiment-area need your support! I hope that all of us will get together to build sentiment-area more refulgent ! thank you!
sentences.sContent_eng: The development and progress of sentiment-area need your support! I hope that all of us will get together to build sentiment-area more refulgent ! thank you!
sentences.sCn: 情感区的发展和进步需要你们的帮助！我希望我们能一起把情感区建设得更加辉煌！谢谢！

remMethod.val: re + fulg (发光) + ent → 辉煌的
